description: Now you see it, now you don't. This sectional kayak breaks down into 6 pieces that fit in car trunks or elevators. When assembled, it’s ocean-worthy and ready for day tripping and multi-day touring. Its rudder-ready design makes it a great choice for paddlers seeking a touring craft  with a low storage footprint.Single-layer roto-moulded resin construction, the same as in one-piece kayaks.Sectional design allows for compact storage, quick assembly and easy transport without a roof rack.6 sections nest into each other in a storage bag.3/4 ton holding force creates a reliable watertight seal between each section.Fore and aft bulkheads maintain buoyancy.Bow and stern watertight hatches.Deck bungees at the fore and aft of the cockpit.Foam seat has an adjustable back.Adjustable foot braces.Packed size: 107 x 61 x 41cm (42 x 24 x 16in.)Rudder ready (sold separately).Pakayak donates a portion of profit toward conservation efforts for this kayak's namesake, the noble Bluefin tuna.
name: Pakayak Bluefin 142 Kayak
